instruction: Create a special offer for a customer.
input: Product: Spirit II E-210 Gas Grill
output: Take your grilling experience to the next level with the Spirit II E-210 Gas Grill! For a limited time, when you buy this two-burner, stainless steel gas grill you'll also get a free cover to protect it, as well as a set of BBQ tools for secure, hassle-free grilling. Hurry, this special offer won't last long – get your Spirit II E-210 Gas Grill now!
